description:
Chihiro finds an abandoned dog on the street and takes it home, but Madoka is deathly afraid of dogs...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feed a Dog for Three Days and He Will Remember It for Three Years
Inu wa Mikka Kaeba Sannen On o Wasurenu
Un chien se souviendra qu`on l`a nourri trois jours pendant trois ans
いぬは三日飼えば三年恩を忘れぬ
